alert.note: Alert for Kennebec; Somerset (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 19 at 2:49PM EDT until June 20 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Maine... Kennebec River At Skowhegan affecting Somerset and Kennebec Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Kennebec River at Skowhegan. * WHEN...Until tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 35,000.0 cfs, Flooding begins at campgrounds in Skowhegan. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:30 PM EDT Monday the flow was 34,145.0 cfs. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise back above flood stage this evening, to a crest of 35,100.0 cfs late tonight or tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage by the afternoon. - Flood flow is 35,000.0 cfs. &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
